quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Term and Cave
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, mccallister, kangaroo. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which term applies to a woman who has earned a PhD?
What is the term for a male sibling?
In 1814 we took a little trip
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Ballad of New Orleans

questions.question: The word bachelorette has replaced which offensive term for an unmarried older woman?
Which of the following refers to the female side of the family?
Which of the following terms refers to a female homeless child who roams the streets?
Grammatically correct gender terminology  includes which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What is a female octopus called?
It was the third of June when Mama announced that Billy Joe McCallister jumped off the

options.text: Something small and wrapped in a blanket
Something that flashed in the sun
The song never reveals what was thrown off the bridge

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The song never reveals what was thrown off the bridge

questions.question: What is the term for a female baby kangaroo?

Which term is preferred by more and more female performers of stage and screen?
Many explorers such as Marco Polo may have confused rhinoceros for unicorns.
The coat of arms of the Society of Apothecaries in London is adorned with how many unicorns?

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Greeting and Language
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, kowtow, jour. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In south Germany and Austria, Grüß Gott is commonly used as a greeting. What does it literally mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: God bless you

questions.question: You probably wouldnt be able to pronounce the word cześć, but try to guess in which language is it used as a greeting.
In which language is Hola used as a greeting?
What word means the same as meager?
A Japanese greeting meaning good morning is pronounced like the name of this US state.
Two words that can be interchanged in a context are said to be antonyms.
The Chinese term Kowtow refers to an act of deep respect. How is it performed?

options.text: By kneeling and bowing so low as to touch the head to the ground

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By kneeling and bowing so low as to touch the head to the ground

questions.question: Where will you most likely hear howdy as a greeting?
How could you welcome your Italian friend in his/her native language?
At what time of the day is it proper to use the Dutch greeting goedenavond?
What is the literal meaning of the French greeting bon jour?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Good day

questions.question: Shalom aleichem and Salam alaikum are common greetings in Hebrew and Arabic, respectively. What is the meaning of both?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peace to you

questions.question: Constant means changing.
In which culture is pressing noses used as a greeting?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maori (New Zealand)

questions.question: Sik Jo Fan Mei means have you eaten yet?. In which country it is used as a greeting?

questions.question: This influential philosopher espoused the master-slave theory of morality and believed in the will to power as the motivating force behind animal and human behavior.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: William of Ockham

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sidney Sheldon

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shelley Duvall

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thomas Hobbes

questions.question: In chemistry SHE stands for Standard Helium Electrode.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bertrand Russell

questions.question: Whats the name of the singer who was involved with bicyclist Lance Armstrong?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sheryl Crow

questions.question: Ancient Greeks believed that this Titan created man.
